citeinfo.title: Mineral Commodity Summaries 2024 - QUARTZ (HIGH-PURITY AND INDUSTRIAL CULTURED CRYSTAL) Data Release

descript.abstract: This data release contains the U.S. salient statistics and world production data extracted from the QUARTZ (HIGH-PURITY AND INDUSTRIAL CULTURED CRYSTAL) data sheet of the USGS Mineral Commodity Summaries 2024.
descript.purpose: Published on an annual basis, the USGS Mineral Commodity Summaries report is the earliest Government publication to furnish estimates covering nonfuel mineral industry data. Data sheets contain information on the domestic industry structure, Government programs, tariffs, and 5-year salient statistics for over 90 individual minerals and materials.
descript.supplinf: Where possible, data are those finalized for publication in the 2022 U.S. Geological Survey Minerals Yearbook Volume I - Metals and Minerals. For 2023, USGS National Minerals Information Center provided estimates based on available data from USGS surveys of the industry, other industry sources, and mineral commodity specialist research.

idinfo.accconst: None. Please see 'Distribution Info' for details.
idinfo.useconst: None. Users are advised to read the dataset's metadata thoroughly to understand appropriate use and data limitations.

citeinfo.title: USGS National Minerals Information Center Silica Web Page
citeinfo.othercit: Provides information and links to all available USGS National Minerals Information Center publications about QUARTZ (HIGH-PURITY AND INDUSTRIAL CULTURED CRYSTAL) by publication type and year.

attracc.attraccr: Where possible, data for all years except 2023 have been finalized for publication in the U.S. Geological Survey Minerals Yearbook Volume I - Metals and Minerals; otherwise the data are noted as estimated.

dataqual.logic: Data were checked to ensure that they match those published in the Mineral Commodity Summaries 2024. Data were peer reviewed by Mineral Commodity Specialists and approved by supervisors in compliance with USGS fundamental science practices.
dataqual.complete: This data release contains tabular data found in the associated publication Mineral Commodity Summaries 2024 (MCS 2024); additional detailed information is available in the full text version of MCS 2024.

citeinfo.title: USGS Minerals Yearbook Volume I - Metals and Minerals

srcinfo.srccontr: Source of salient statistics for 2019 through 2022 and basis for estimates for 2023. The data in the Minerals Yearbook are based on USGS surveys sent to companies involved in the industry for each mineral commodity.
trade statistics for 2019 through 2022 and basis of trade statistics estimates for 2023

procstep.procdesc: Salient statistics for each mineral commodity were compiled from published 2022 U.S. Geological Survey Minerals Yearbook Volume I - Metals and Minerals chapters or from finalized tables of those to be published. Data for 2023 were estimated based on available 2023 data and industry trends. Estimates for world production were made for 2023 in collaboration with USGS National Minerals Information Center Global Minerals Analysis specialists using best available data.

enttyp.enttypd: Comma Separated Value (CSV) file containing data.

attr.attrdef: Mineral commodity for which the data were compiled.

edom.edomvd: Ground high-purity quartz (HPQ) is typically defined as ground natural quartz with less than 100 parts per million of impurities and has further defined standards for the concentrations of specific impurities allowed. Industrial cultured quartz crystal is electronic-grade quartz crystal that is manufactured, not mined.

attr.attrdef: Year for which the data were compiled.

U.S. production: ground high-purity quartz. Estimated. Production is estimated from a combination of publicly available data, published sources, and industry trends. Data are rounded to the nearest hundred thousand metric tons to avoid disclosing company proprietary data.

Imports for consumption: ground high-purity quartz. Trade data for ground high-purity quartz are included in Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States (HTS) codes 2505.10.1000 and 2505.10.1050 but are mixed with other types of sand and quartz. A reliable estimate cannot be made.

Imports: ground high-purity quartz. Trade data for ground high-purity quartz are included in Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States (HTS) codes 2505.10.1000 and 2505.10.1050 but are mixed with other types of sand and quartz. A reliable estimate cannot be made.

Price, range of value, dollars per metric ton. Price is estimated from a combination of reported prices, trade data prices, and industry trends. Prices vary based on the percentage of quartz, percentage and type of impurities, and end use of the ground high-purity quartz.
Net import reliance as a percentage of apparent consumption. Net import reliance is defined as imports – exports. Data are estimated for the most recent year.

edom.edomvd: E: Net exporter NA: Not Available

attr.attrdef: U.S. production: Industrial cultured quartz crystal. Data are estimated for the most recent year.

edom.edomvd: Withheld to avoid disclosing company proprietary data.

attr.attrdef: mports for consumption: Piezoelectric quartz, unmounted. Data are estimated for the most recent year.
Exports: Piezoelectric quartz, unmounted. Data are estimated for the most recent year.
Price, dollars per kilogram: As-grown cultured quartz. Data are estimated for all years. Price is estimated from a combination of reported prices, trade data prices, and industry trends

Price, dollars per kilogram: Lumbered quartz. As-grown cultured quartz that has been processed by sawing and grinding. Data are estimated for all years. Price is estimated from a combination of reported prices, trade data prices, and industry trends.
Net import reliance as a percentage of apparent consumption. Net import reliance is defined as imports – exports. Data are estimated for the most recent year.

edom.edomvd: E: Net exporter NA: Not Available

overview.eaover: One CSV file was produced from the data published in the Mineral Commodity Summaries 2024. This includes U.S. Salient Statistics for production, consumption, trade, and other data pertinent to QUARTZ CRYSTAL (INDUSTRIAL) for the years 2019 to 2023.
overview.eadetcit: Companion data for QUARTZ CRYSTAL (INDUSTRIAL) data sheet of Mineral Commodity Summaries 2024

cntaddr.address: Denver Federal Center, Building 810, Mail Stop 302

distinfo.distliab: Unless otherwise stated, all data, metadata and related materials are considered to satisfy the quality standards relative to the purpose for which the data were collected. Although these data and associated metadata have been reviewed for accuracy and completeness and approved for release by the U.S. Geological Survey (USGS), no warranty expressed or implied is made regarding the display or utility of the data on any other system or for general or scientific purposes, nor shall the act of distribution constitute any such warranty.
